p: The title compound was prepared by treating 2,6-difluoro- N-(3-{3-[2-({7-[(trifluoroacetyl)amino]-5,6,7,8-tetrahydro-2-naphthalenyl}amino)-4-pyrimidinyl]pyrazolo[1,5- a]pyridin-2-yl}phenyl)benzamide (161 mg, 0.24 mmol) with excess LiOH (200 mg) in MeOH. After stirring for 15 h at rt, the reaction was concentrated. The crude was partitioned between CHCl 3 and saturated aqueous NaHCO 3. The organic was washed with brine, dried over Na 2SO 4 and concentrated to a brown powder. Yield: 97 mg (70%). 1H NMR (400 MHz, DMSO- d 6) δ 10.91 (s, 1 H), 9.34 (d, 1 H), 8.82 (d, 1 H), 8.45 (d, 1 H), 8.21 (d, 1 H), 7.98 (s, 1 H), 7.79 (d,1H), 7.54 (m, 1 H), 7.46 (s, 3H), 7.33 (m, 2H), 7.23 (m, 2H), 7.10 (s, 1 H), 6.90 (d, 1 H), 6.46 (d, 1 H), 2.96 (brs, 1 H), 2.85-2.55 (m, 3H), 2.40-2.33 (m, 1 H), 1.82 (m, 1 H), 1.66 (m, 2H), 1.41 (m, 1 H); ESIMS (M+H)+ = 588.27.
